## Fit a Kaplan-Meier and plot it 
```{r}
library(survival)
fit <- survfit(Surv(time,status)~x, data=aml)
aml
plot(fit, lty = 2:3)
legend(100, .8, c("Maintained","nonmaintained"), lty = 2:3)
plot(fit, lty = 2:3, fun = "cumhaz")
```
